item.title: Convex optimization for binary tree-based transport networks (DGMM24)
item.description: Authors : # Raoul Sallé de Chou(1,2), Mohamed Ali Srir(1) , Laurent Najman(3) , Nicolas Passat(4) , Hugues Talbot (5,3) , Irène Vignon-Clementel(1)

item.title: My journey
item.description: Intro # In this page, I want a talk about my journey, note that I am cherry-picking information, I am mostly talking about things I succeeded in but it is important to know that I failed in a lot of things (I may make a CV of failure as I saw in another website, someday).
